akn:section.akn:heading: Eligibility of distribution borrowers for loans, loan guarantees, and lien accommodations

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 936d. Eligibility of distribution borrowers for loans, loan guarantees, and lien accommodations For the purpose of determining the eligibility of a distribution borrower not in default on the repayment of a loan made or guaranteed under this chapter for a loan, loan guarantee, or lien accommodation under this subchapter, a default by a borrower from which the distribution borrower purchases wholesale power shall not—(1) be considered a default by the distribution borrower;
(2) reduce the eligibility of the distribution borrower for assistance under this chapter; or
(3) be the cause, directly or indirectly, of imposing any requirement or restriction on the borrower as a condition of the assistance, except such requirements or restrictions as are necessary to implement a debt restructuring agreed on by the power supply borrower and the Government.
